igeo
Class IDynamicServer

java.lang.Object
  igeo.IDynamicServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class IDynamicServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

A server to take care of all IDynamicObject. It runs as separate thread.

Author:
Satoru Sugihara
